Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, Runnable
public class CLI extends Object implements Runnable, UI
Class CLI represents the main class for the Client Command Line Interface component. It handles messages coming from ClientSocket, parses input text from player and prints context and error messages accordingly to the client current state

  • Method Details

    • setNextState

      public void setNextState(ClientState newState)
      Method setNextState set the current client state to a new one given as parameter. After that it prints the new context message
      Parameters:
      newState - is the new state

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run instantiates the client socket and while it's active parses input text from player If input is valid, a message is built accordingly to client state and passed to client socket to be sent to the server
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • handleMessageFromServer

      public void handleMessageFromServer(Message receivedMessage)
      Method handleMessageFromServer receives a Message instance from ClientSocket and react accordingly to the message type.
      Specified by:
      handleMessageFromServer in interface UI
      Parameters:
      receivedMessage - received from server. If the message is instance of ClientStateMessage, handleMessageFromServer changes the current client state If the message is instance of ErrorMessage, handleMessageFromServer prints the error message accordingly to the current client state If the message is instance of UpdateMessage, handleMessageFromServer updates the GameBoard instance

    • instantiateSocket

      public void instantiateSocket() throws IOException
      Method instantiateSocket asks player for IP and port and tries to instantiate a client socket on a new thread with the input parameters. If connection fails an error message is print
      Throws:
      IOException

    • prepareView

      public void prepareView(ArrayList<Object> data)
      Method prepareView initializes GameBoard instance with game parameters
      Specified by:
      prepareView in interface UI
      Parameters:
      data - contains game parameters

    • updateView

      public void updateView(Message updateMessage)
      Method updateView updates GameBoard using contents of a message passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      updateMessage - is the message which contains contents needed for the update

    • visualizeContextMessage

      private void visualizeContextMessage()
      Method visualizeContextMessage prints a context message accordingly to the current client state

    • visualizeServerErrorMessage

      private void visualizeServerErrorMessage()
      Method visualizeServerErrorMessage prints a server error message accordingly to the current client state

    • visualizeInputErrorMessage

      private void visualizeInputErrorMessage()
      Method visualizeInputErrorMessage prints an input error message accordingly to the current client state

    • visualizeCustomMessage

      public void visualizeCustomMessage(String customMessage)
      Method visualizeCustomMessage prints a custom message accordingly to parameter string
      Parameters:
      customMessage - is the message to print on the output stream

    • askIP

      public String askIP()
      Method askIP asks the player for the server IP
      Returns:
      ip as a string

    • askPort

      public int askPort()
      Method askPort asks the player for the server port
      Returns:
      port as a string

    • handleClosingServer

      public void handleClosingServer()
